title: One week post op BA!
author: EllieThrowaway113
selftext: First four are after 48hrs to day six, the last two are one week before. I got 405cc smooth moderate plus profile xtra silicone gel-filled breast implant on both sides! So far really excited and happy with the results. The anesthesia went really well. They gave me something to relax and then rolled me back, anesthesia and then the next thing I know I was awake recovering. Pain has been manageable and honestly the recovery has been pretty chill.

comments.author: No_Plate4236
comments.body: I have a question do you have the breast implants over the muscle or under the pectoral muscle

comments.body: What was your band size pre op?Â

comments.author: EllieThrowaway113
comments.body: So I had it placed under the subfascial lining so above muscle under lining.

comments.author: EllieThrowaway113
comments.body: Yes! I definitely needed help the first two days anything after that was nice too. The surgery was over in an instant for me and pain has been there but manageable. Hope yours goes great!

comments.author: TijayesPJs443
comments.body: You should be ok but tbh I was too afraid of someone bumping into me or whatever to do anything for the first week.
